comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Fantastic ride today. Blue skies and virtually no clouds. As a result, Matt Burton and I were afforded great views of the Divide.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Ah it's the slacker's life for me! While you endorphine-toadies were cranking up the canyon, I strolled up to the hill and had a nice fattening lunch (the fries were so greasy you could see through them... cool!). So this is how it starts...
